name: Paragraph icons for Annotator.js
description: An icon next to each paragraph, that matches the text style. Makes annotation easier to discover.

name: annotator-marginalia
description: Display annotations in the margin of the page

name: annotator-meltdown
description: Formatted annotations using markdown notation with a toolbar and preview

name: annotator-meltdown-zotero
description: Search for Zotero citations and add them to annotations using the Zotero web API (requires annotator-meltdown)

name: annotator-imgselect
description: Select and annotate portions of images

name: Symfony - PageAnnotatorBundle
description: Symfony Bundle using AnnotatorJs. Store Plugin implemented and it lets you annotate with fixed values.

name: Touch Plugin
description: Support for touch devices (iOS, Android, etc.)

name: Offline Plugin
description: Support for working on documents while offline, using your browser's localStorage

name: Annotator Wordpress Plugin
description: Installs and integrates the Annotator with your Wordpress site.

name: Categories Plugin
description: Assign pre-defined categories to annotation and highlight each with different colors. (There is a pull request pending that is not yet fully integrated (waiting for tests)). This does not work with HEAD for now and requires a full check out of the fork (based on a slightly older fork).

name: Roundup Plugin
description: Provide some integration with the Roundup ticket tracker

name: Margin Viewer Plugin
description: Display annotations in the margins

name: Heatmap Plugin
description: Some heatmap related plugin

name: Readmill Plugin
description: Allows you to submit highlights and comments to Readmill

name: Drupal Module
description: A Drupal module that integrates Annotator with your Drupal site.

name: Lorestore Plugin
description: An alternate store plugin that provides compatibility with OpenAnnotation as implemented by lorestore

name: Motivations Plugin
description: allows OA motivations to be attached to annotations

name: Prov Plugin
description: displays OA provenance properties in annotation viewer

name: Share-annotator
description: share text and video annotations using social networks or email

name: Geolocation-annotator
description: set the current user position with HTML5 geolocation to the annotation

name: RichText Annotator
description: richText give you the possibility to add rich media (rich text, pictures, movies, sounds, ...) using Tinymce in your annotations

name: Symfony-annotator
description: Symfony Bundle using Annotator and the Store plugin.

name: Tags-annotator
description: Allows you to set pre-determined tags with color differentiators as well as let the users input their own personal tags in a tokenized way.

name: Panel Viewer Plugin
description: Universitat Oberta de Catalunya - Allows you to view the annotations in a panel in the right side. You can delete, expand, collapse the panel and find annotations.

name: MIT Annotation Data Store
description: Data Store and RESTful web API for Annotation Studio, compatible with Annotator.
owner: MIT HyperStudio - Digital Humanities Lab at MIT

name: Annotator Categories
description: A plugin for Annotator.js that allows users to select categories for annotations, changes colors.
